channel.title: Cregox cast 2 - read my mind, oooh yeah!
channel.description:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/x83enckr0j16zny/2016-02-11%2013.02.23.jpg?dl=1 <details><summary>_try to figure out what's in my mind before clicking here to find out the answer!_</summary>are you sure? [spoiler]yay, I found a cancerogenous papaya which tastes good![/spoiler] </details>
if you know me you should be able to guess it properly as [the right answer is one filled with 3 elements](https://www.quora.com/What-do-I-need-to-learn-in-order-to-research-artificial-intelligence/answer/Caue-Rego): **logic + art + philosophy**.
( still unsure of what's the best category for buffering this... since it's on "help", the request is: come join us! )
now, continuing the discussion from [Starting a pod with this making of "cregox cast"](http://talk.cregox.com/t/starting-a-pod-with-this-making-of-cregox-cast/7843/2):
# read my mind
rules are simple. host brings up a topic, then write down something about it that other players will have to guess. each player will have a few minutes to give it a shot after a presentation and then the answer will be revealed. so it's basically a riddle in which each player takes turn to take a guess.
it will happen near the cast ending because we're not sure everyone will be online near the beginning. I'll always bring a subject for this game, so we'll talk [about](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passage_(video_game)) [PASSAGE](http://hcsoftware.sourceforge.net/passage/) (play it at least twice, [online](http://passage.toolness.org/) if you prefer).
be our guest to bring up a subject for other players trying to read what's in your mind! ;)
## schedule and plans for the future
as the first cast, this one will happen on a Saturday (**today**) at 22:00 UTC, which means I'll start broadcasting in about 5 hours. all the next ones, in case this one also brings a good result, might get moved to Sundays, at 20 UTC.
let's do this!
http://youtu.be/QO3gwJSVAM4 [link to participate](https://hangouts.google.com/call/gibd2ktss7b2eqkc4c7v64nmlma)
